long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snake for Chrome Extension is an exciting game that brings the authentic snake experience right to your browser in a convenient popup format. With smooth animations and a saved high score feature, this extension provides a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience.

This extension allows you, as the user, to play the classic snake game anytime and anywhere without the need to open a new window or tab. It offers a hassle-free way to indulge in the addictive gameplay of snake right within your Chrome browser.

One standout feature of this extension is its ability to save your high score. Unlike many other options available, you don't have to rely on your memory to recall that impressive score you achieved. The extension automatically keeps track of your highest score, allowing you to proudly share it with your friends.

To play "Snake" for Chrome Extension, simply visit the website https://googlesnake.org/ and enjoy the game for free. Experience smooth animations, navigate through the levels, and strive to achieve the highest score possible.

Whether you're seeking a nostalgic gaming experience or a quick way to pass the time, "Snake" for Chrome Extension has got you covered. Install the extension, launch the game in a popup, and immerse yourself in the classic snake gameplay. Have fun and enjoy the challenge of beating your own high score!

Note: If you want play more games please click on "More Games" or you can find on our website is: https://googlesnake.org/ Thanks!
